mapper.select: select idx, duty_name, duty_addr From tblpharmacy where Locate(#{telCode}, duty_tel1)
SELECT idx, duty_name, duty_addr FROM tblpharmacy WHERE Locate(#{userSearchWord}, duty_addr)
SELECT idx, duty_name, duty_addr FROM tblpharmacy WHERE duty_tel1 LIKE CONCAT('%', #{telCode}, '%') AND Locate(#{userSearchWord}, duty_addr);
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (re_id, re_md_addr, re_md_name, re_contents, re_create_date) VALUES (#{reId}, #{reMdAddr}, #{reMdName}, #{reContents}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT A.*, @rownum := @rownum+1 AS reNum FROM ( SELECT re_id, re_contents, re_md_name, re_create_date FROM review as rv LEFT JOIN tblhealthcenter as hc ON rv.re_md_addr = hc.medical_addr JOIN (SELECT @rownum := 0) AS R WHERE hc.idx = #{idx} ORDER BY rv.re_create_date DESC) AS A
